Group.title: IPSec Support
Group.description: Support for Internet Protocol Security (IPsec) is provided in Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 with openswan and libreswan packages respectively.

Rule.title: Install openswan or libreswan Package
Rule.description: The openswan and libreswan packages provide an implementation of IPsec and IKE, which permits the creation of secure tunnels over untrusted networks.
Rule.ocil: If the system does not communicate over untrusted networks, this is not applicable.
Rule.rationale: Providing the ability for remote users or systems to initiate a secure VPN connection protects information when it is transmitted over a wide area network.
